title: Nocturnes CC score
body:
Is broken.
Idk if its his Fear tether or his ultimate causing it.
But one of them is heavily padding his CC score.
to a degree where he has 6x the CC score of a Leona.

replies.body: I recommend posting this in [Report A Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) instead.
